title: many Old Judges for sale, some rare
author: Archive

posts.post_title: many Old Judges for sale, some rare
posts.post_content:
Posted By: javan brigham
I have made the very difficult decision to part with my collection of 5 years to pursue other interests. I thought I would make everything available to board members before exploring other avenues. I have done business with many board members and can supply ebay and forum references upon request. E-mails will be answered in the order they are recieved-please be patient. I'll gladly send a scan of anything you like.

OLD JUDGES

Delehanty (fielding, hands at waist) heavily trimmed, tack holes SOLD
Zimmer vg SOLD
